relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress, conversant and interactive.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclerae anicteric, mucous membranes moist, oropharynx clear.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, S1 S2.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, respirations are unlabored.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, mildly distended, slightly tender around incision sites.
relevant_findings.extremities: No lower extremity edema, distal extremities warm and well-perfused.
